text: Barbara Hsu (; 6 October 1976 â€“ 2 February 2025) was a Taiwanese actress, singer, and television host. She was best known for her main role as Shancai in the television series Meteor Garden (2001). Hsu died on 2 February 2025 while on vacation in Tokyo due to 2025 Japan flu cases from pneumonia caused by influenza at the age of 48. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Taiwanese movie actors Category:Taiwanese television actors Category:Taiwanese singers Category:Television personalities Category:People from Taipei Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from influenza
title: Barbie Hsu
